description:
After failing to migrate an instance with an iSCSI volume to HOST A, we can no longer migrate any instances with an iSCSI volume to HOST A.

The error message from nova-compute is as follows:
2011-03-25 11:16:26,640 ERROR nova.rpc [-] ['Traceback (most recent call last):
', '  File "/home/nttdata/nova/nova/rpc.py", line 183, in _receive
    rval = node_func(context=ctxt, **node_args)
', '  File "/home/nttdata/nova/nova/compute/manager.py", line 875, in pre_live_migration
    self.volume_manager.setup_compute_volume(context, v['id'])
', '  File "/home/nttdata/nova/nova/volume/manager.py", line 164, in setup_compute_volume
    path = self.driver.discover_volume(context, volume_ref)
', '  File "/home/nttdata/nova/nova/volume/driver.py", line 456, in discover_volume
    self._run_iscsiadm(iscsi_properties, "--login")
', '  File "/home/nttdata/nova/nova/volume/driver.py", line 428, in _run_iscsiadm
    iscsi_command)
', '  File "/home/nttdata/nova/nova/utils.py", line 173, in execute
    cmd=' '.join(cmd))
', "ProcessExecutionError: Unexpected error while running command.
Command: sudo iscsiadm -m node -T iqn.2010-10.org.openstack:volume-00000001 -p 10.192.12.34:3260 --login
Exit code: 255
Stdout: 'Logging in to [iface: default, target: iqn.2010-10.org.openstack:volume-00000001, portal: 10.192.12.34,3260]\n'
Stderr: 'iscsiadm: Could not login to [iface: default, target: iqn.2010-10.org.openstack:volume-00000001, portal: 10.192.12.34,3260]: \niscsiadm: initiator reported error (15 - already exists)\n'
"]
title: nova-compute should logout an iSCSI target on migration failure

comments.content:
After failing to migrate an instance with an iSCSI volume to HOST A, we can no longer migrate any instances with an iSCSI volume to HOST A.

The error message from nova-compute is as follows:
2011-03-25 11:16:26,640 ERROR nova.rpc [-] ['Traceback (most recent call last):
', '  File "/home/nttdata/nova/nova/rpc.py", line 183, in _receive
    rval = node_func(context=ctxt, **node_args)
', '  File "/home/nttdata/nova/nova/compute/manager.py", line 875, in pre_live_migration
    self.volume_manager.setup_compute_volume(context, v['id'])
', '  File "/home/nttdata/nova/nova/volume/manager.py", line 164, in setup_compute_volume
    path = self.driver.discover_volume(context, volume_ref)
', '  File "/home/nttdata/nova/nova/volume/driver.py", line 456, in discover_volume
    self._run_iscsiadm(iscsi_properties, "--login")
', '  File "/home/nttdata/nova/nova/volume/driver.py", line 428, in _run_iscsiadm
    iscsi_command)
', '  File "/home/nttdata/nova/nova/utils.py", line 173, in execute
    cmd=' '.join(cmd))
', "ProcessExecutionError: Unexpected error while running command.
Command: sudo iscsiadm -m node -T iqn.2010-10.org.openstack:volume-00000001 -p 10.192.12.34:3260 --login
Exit code: 255
Stdout: 'Logging in to [iface: default, target: iqn.2010-10.org.openstack:volume-00000001, portal: 10.192.12.34,3260]\n'
Stderr: 'iscsiadm: Could not login to [iface: default, target: iqn.2010-10.org.openstack:volume-00000001, portal: 10.192.12.34,3260]: \niscsiadm: initiator reported error (15 - already exists)\n'
"]
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mnogu

comments.content: Before migrateToURI() in _live_migration() is called, nova-compute logs in an iSCSI target in pre_live_migration() if an iSCSI volume is attached to a migrating instance. If nova-compute doesn't log out a target on migration failure, when we try to migrate an instance to the same host, nova-compute tries to log in the same target as it has already logged in.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mnogu
